name: Time Matter
loreDescription: A source of power that Guardian Kazran wields that controls time. It can bring forth a time in the past that no one can remember.

skillDescription.base: Reduces skill cooldown by 1 turn when an enemy is killed and increases the damage of the next attack by 18.0%. Can only be activated once per skill.
skillDescription.max: Reduces skill cooldown by 1 turn when an enemy is killed and increases the damage of the next attack by 36.0%. Can only be activated once per skill.
